A

AbstractProcessor - Class in rath.msnm
각 DS, NS, SS의 공통이 되는 부분을 추상적으로 묶어놓은 클래스이다.
AbstractProcessor(MSNMessenger) - Constructor for class rath.msnm.AbstractProcessor
Client processor가 아닌 Server processor로 사용할때 즉, ServerInfo가 필요없을때 이 생성자를 통하여 인스턴스를 생성하도록 한다.
AbstractProcessor(MSNMessenger, ServerInfo) - Constructor for class rath.msnm.AbstractProcessor
주어진 ServerInfo를 가지는 Processor를 생성한다.
AbstractProcessor(MSNMessenger, ServerInfo, int) - Constructor for class rath.msnm.AbstractProcessor
주어진 ServerInfo를 가지고 trId를 최초 트랜잭션 아이디로 가지는 Processor를 생성한다.

ackLength - Variable in class rath.msnm.msg.ptop.PtopMessage
 
ackSessionId - Variable in class rath.msnm.msg.ptop.PtopMessage
The seventh field is a DWORD and is an important field, if the SessionID field is zero and the data doesn't contain the SessionID then this field contains the Identifier of the previous received message, most of the time the Flag field is 0x2 then.

applicationId - Variable in class rath.msnm.msg.ptop.PtopMessage
The 4-byte binary footer consists of 1 DWORD which is in Little Endian order and that field represents the ApplicationIdentifier (AppID).
